title: Hyundai Motors India anticipates SUVs to dominate two-thirds of sales in 2024
description: Hyundai Motor India expects SUVs to contribute to two-thirds of its sales this year, with a refreshed portfolio including the Creta I. The company did not disclose plans for an electric version of the Creta. SUVs have gained popularity in India, with Hyundai offering a full range of products in the segment. The midsize SUV segment has seen rapid growth, with the Creta holding a 31% market share.
